content: this masterpiece crochet throw features a textured floral motif each motif starts as a pretty flower that s squared off for easy seaming pattern features a variety of techniques including cluster stitches and back post stitches for added texture join the squares with a lacy single_crochet and chain-1 mesh stitch to complete featuring red heart super saver ombre it s easy to add color gradients to this attractive blanket video tutorial from the crochet crowd https //www youtube com/watch v=qxaktogza5y
